sourcesContent:
function RestaurantDetails({ image:url, name:title, cost, rating, votes, reviews, paymentMethods, cuisine:tags }){ return(
{title}
{tags}
Cost ${cost} for one
accepts {JSON.stringify(paymentMethods)}
{rating}
{votes} votes
{reviews}reviews
) } export default RestaurantDetails
